headline.print_headline: SAP Agrees to Buy Expense Software Maker Concur for $7.3 Billion
headline.main: SAP Agrees to Buy Expense Software Maker Concur for $7.3 Billion

lead_paragraph: German business software maker SAP said on Thursday it has agreed to acquire U.S.-based expense management software maker Concur Technologies Inc in an all-stock deal valued at $7.3 billion that expands its presence in internet-based software or so-called cloud computing.
